message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Considering its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair offer reflecting its worth. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your perspective on the value.  While $1,150,000 is a significant offer, I believe the true value of the product is closer to my initial proposal. How about we meet in the middle at $1,225,000?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $1,225,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $1,175,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
